item.title: Melinda French Gates Is Resigning From the Gates Foundation
item.description: She said she is moving into “the next chapter” with her philanthropy and will have an additional $12.5 billion to commit to her work on behalf of women and girls.

item.title: Basic Materials Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Read about BHP, Salzgitter, K+S and more in the latest Market Talks covering Basic Materials.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Delivery Hero, Apple, and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Nasdaq Edges Higher With Inflation in Focus
item.description: The Nasdaq edged higher, while the S&P 500 and Dow were wavering around the flat line.

item.title: New Florida Law Roils Its Condo Market Three Years After Surfside Collapse
item.description: More units are being dumped on the market because of six-figure special assessments tied to repairs for older buildings.

item.title: Former Fixer Michael Cohen Testifies Trump Micromanaged His Work
item.description: The former president’s loyalist-turned-nemesis is critical to the prosecution’s case in the hush-money trial.

item.title: A More Honest Climate Science?
item.description: Maybe scientific journals are ready to move past the era of politicized pronouncements.

item.title: 'The Loves of Theodore Roosevelt' Review: For Teddy, Family Mattered
item.description: Five extraordinary women in TR’s life were his most trusted advisers, his most insightful strategists and his most faithful supporters.

item.title: More »
item.description: Suddenly, there just aren&#x27;t enough babies in the world. It&#x27;s going to change everything.

item.title: Future Problems for Private Lending Will Start Today
item.description: Lenders are stepping back into the market for risky loans, even as borrower demand has been tepid, threatening to throw the market out of balance.

item.title: Fighting Flares Across Gaza Amid Push to Revive Israel-Hamas Talks
item.description: Israeli troops are clashing with Hamas not only in Rafah, the militant group’s last stronghold, but also in the enclave’s north.

item.title: Dollar Could Struggle to Rise Further Unless U.S. Rate Hike Looks Possible
item.description: The U.S. dollar was down on the day and could struggle to build on recent gains unless an interest-rate hike by the Fed becomes a realistic possibility, FX strategists at HSBC said.

item.title: Anglo Rejects BHP's Fresh $43 Billion Bid
item.description: The approach by the Australian mining company shows an eagerness to boost exposure to copper at a time when demand for the metal is expected to rise.

item.title: France Secures $16 Billion From Microsoft, Amazon, Others at Foreign Investment Summit
item.description: The investment commitments underscore a push from President Emmanuel Macron to promote the country as an attractive destination for international investors.

item.title: How the Maple-Syrup Cartel Keeps a Sticky Grip on Global Market
item.description: Quebec’s 50 million maple trees produce 72% of the world’s supply, leaving Vermont to pine for the good old days.

item.title: Natural Gas Extends Gains as Demand is Forecast to Rise
item.description: Natural gas futures rose as hot weather was forecast and expected to keep demand high.

item.title: The Morning Risk Report
item.description: Cybersecurity risk rose in past year, say compliance professionals, and the CFTC wants to ban trades tied to elections, sports and awards contests.

item.title: Bob Menendez Expected to Get Personal in Corruption Trial Defense
item.description: The senator faces 16 criminal counts, including bribery, fraud and foreign-agent offenses.

item.title: GameStop Stock Jumps; Meme-Stock Guru Returns
item.description: GameStop Stock Jumps; Meme-Stock Guru Returns

item.title: GameStop Stock Jumps; Meme-Stock Guru 'Roaring Kitty' Returns
item.description: GameStop shares soared after an X account associated with Keith Gill, the investor known as “Roaring Kitty,” posted its first tweet Sunday in almost three years.
